alert.note: Alert for Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Taylor County through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Perry, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Secotan, Boyd, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Hampton Springs and Fenholloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
